definition: thin/to lose weight/(of clothing) tight/(of meat) lean/(of land) unproductive
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: AS the Nomogram was made, it provided a more simple and convenient method for estimating the lean yield.
sentences.chinese: 列線圖的製作爲估算瘦肉量提供了更簡便的方法。

sentences.english: Maximum lean growth daily may not always be sought .
sentences.chinese: 每日的最大瘦肉生長量不可能經常達到。

sentences.english: You can put pig's belly or lean meat in the steamed sandwich, which can beat McDonald's Big Mac.
sentences.chinese: 割包可以選五花肉或瘦肉，中國的漢堡不輸麥當勞。

sentences.english: Try looking for extra-lean or all-white-meat ground turkey.
sentences.chinese: 你應該試着去找全瘦肉，或味道較好的絞火雞肉。

sentences.english: What negative impacts do 'Shuanghui' have after this issue happened in your opinion?
sentences.chinese: 您認爲“瘦肉精”對雙匯有哪些方面的負面影響？

sentences.english: I minced the lean meat finely before making dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 包餃子前，我把瘦肉細細剁碎。

sentences.english: We still eat regular lean meat maybe once a week or less.
sentences.chinese: 但我們仍然每週一次或幾週一次喫定量的瘦肉。

sentences.english: Thus selection of these body traits wilt improve the lean meat percentage of Small- ear Pigs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，選擇這幾個性狀有可能改善小耳豬的瘦肉率。

sentences.english: Qin Bing cooked preserved egg lean lean porridge to pass to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 秦冰給關海煮了皮蛋瘦肉粥送到醫院。

sentences.english: The powder is added to pig feed to lower the fat content.
sentences.chinese: 豬飼料中加入這種“瘦肉精”能降低脂肪含量。

sentences.english: Blanch the jinhua ham and lean pork. Set aside.
sentences.chinese: 將金華火腿及瘦肉汆水，備用。

sentences.english: Hubei white pig belong to new one of good breed of lean pig.
sentences.chinese: 它屬於優良的瘦肉豬新品種之一。

sentences.english: JAF ordered one century egg & lean meat congee and one side dish.
sentences.chinese: 找食趣點了一碗皮蛋瘦肉粥和一樣小菜。

sentences.english: The contour of the coast of the atlantic of america is very irregular.
sentences.chinese: 從美國大西洋海岸捕獲的幾種瘦肉型魚的肉。

sentences.english: Additives like lean meat powder are really harmful to our health.
sentences.chinese: 像瘦肉精這類食品添加劑對我們的健康是有害的。

sentences.english: The contour of the Atlantic coast of America is very irregular.
sentences.chinese: 從美國大西洋海岸捕獲的幾種瘦肉型魚的肉。
